title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Customized Needs Analysis Design for English for Academic Purposes (EAP) Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can specifically identify academic English skills (reading, writing, presenting) required in disciplinary contexts
Learners can diagnose their learning experiences (engagement, satisfaction) and achievement motivation through self-assessment questionnaires
Learners can understand the differences between EAP and General English (EGAP) and develop learning strategies aligned with academic purposes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
